I know im weird for asking this since... well, vore is weird, but does anyone have links to vore text adventures? Prefered without shrink or giantess.

Sorry if this is in the wrong topic btw, idk in where to request them links.

Posts.EditableText: I suspect the best place to ask would be on vore forums. Games in similar niches often seem to have a long thread on a forum somewhere which acts as the game's homepage, and aren't advertised here.
